text:
if I use text like "müller", it doesn't get handled correctly. Non-english 
languages that use accent marks or characters like german double S result in 
parse error when the test case is loaded.
creator: woolfel@yahoo.com

text: Reproduced in 1.7. Verified it's solved in 1.8. I'll close this bug.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
